thread.title: Super Bowl 51: Patriots' Julian Edelman makes an all-time great Super Bowl catch
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 51: Patriots' Julian Edelman makes an all-time great Super Bowl catch

author: Joe Rivera (Joseph.Rivera@performgroup.com)
title: Super Bowl 51: Patriots' Julian Edelman makes an all-time great Super Bowl catch
text:
â€” NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017 
The catch had everything. A Robert Alford near interception, the high tip, Edelman double-clutching. 
The Patriots have been on the receiving end of great Super Bowl catches in the past, namely: David Tyree in Super Bowl 42 and Mario Manningham in Super Bowl 46. 
With eventually scoring on the drive, Edelman's catch will no doubt go down in history as one of the great Super Bowl catches of all time. Watch This
